emirets supiri giman hala katunayaka guwanthotedi areguwan thotupola saha guwan sewa samagame sabhapathi prasanna wikramasuriya, shri lankawe eksath arabi emir rajyaye thanapathi mahmud mohomad al mahmud, emirets hi sewa anshaye jyeshta upa sabhapathi mohomad maththar, aarthika sanwardhana amathya basil rajapaksha, emirets guwan sewaye sabhapathi tim kla(r)k, siwil guwan sewa amathya pi්rayankara jayarathna, siwil guwan sewa amathyanshaye lekam ranjith silwa, shri lankawa saha maladiwayina sandaha emirets hi kalapiya kalamanakara chandana da silwa yana mahathwaru bandaranayaka jathyanthara guwan thotupale sthapanaya kala emirets supiri giman haledi.emirets guwan samagama bandaranayaka guwan thotupolehi sthapitha kala supiri giman hala pasugiyada wiwrutha kerini.uthsawa sabhawa amathu tim kla(r)k mahatha pawasuwe rupiyal miliyana 200 k aayojanaya karamin nirmanaya kala mema supiri giman hala guwan samagama wisin kolambaa meheyum sandaha wadiduratath ek kala amathara watinakamak wana bawath meya bandaranayaka jathyanthara guwan thotupolata da pahasukamak ek karana bawathya.
